TopicTitle: Solar Panels not functioning anywhere, energy flow 0

Articles.Content:
I've noticed that none (yes, none) of my spacecraft are now receiving any sort of power, despite being in direct sunlight and having sun exposure. I tried verifying the integrity of the game cache as someone on Reddit suggested, but nothing seems to work. Any ideas?

I've included an example here:

![1rzwpw5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/1rzwpw5.jpg)

- - - Updated - - -

Solved it by removing Copernicus and OPM ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I hope they fix them soon.

There's a hotfix for Copernicus apparently: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128101-Solar-Panels-will-not-recharge-anything?p=2075192&viewfull=1#post2075192](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128101-Solar-Panels-will-not-recharge-anything?p=2075192&viewfull=1#post2075192)
